This is the Ethereum dApp, which helps you interact and manage decentralized assets. Users can perform transactions such as transferring/receiving tokens, exchanging to other tokens ... DCY equips you with secure login, token wallet, and token swapping - every What you need to manage your crypto assets.


About ELLAsset UI Library

1. Color & Font Style

The color system and fonts are clear, you can add or customize as you like

2. Component Library

The component library is available in a variety of cases and states

3. Built on the principles of Ant Design

This UI Library was built on the principles of Ant Design and optimized for Figma. Save hundreds of hours and use React, Angular, or Vue library to have your projects developed. The system is frequently updated and used by the best companies.


Features in DCY:

- Walkthrough (5 Screens)

- Create Wallet (16 Screens)

- Account & Network Management (6 Screen) 

- Send Token (16 Screens)

- Receive (6 Screens)

- Buy ETH (2 Screens)

- Swap (8 Screens)

- Collectibles (2 Screens)

- Transaction History (3 Screens) 

- Add Asset (4 Screens)

- Setting (12 Screens)


Highlights:

- Neatly organized & layered

- Customizable useful components 

- Component variants

- Component Auto layout

- Color & Font Variables
